attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our beautiful historical town of Kenilworth is bought to a standstill by so called Horse Fairs. Residents are intimadated, traffic is bought to a standstill and police resources stretched to the limit due to the on slaught of so called horse fair folk to our town.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact your local council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
